cards.rules_text:

cards.rules_text:
{W}{B}{G}, Discard a card named Bahet, God of Destruction: Bahet gains indestructible and becomes a God creature in addition to its other types.
Whenever Bahet enters or attacks, each player chooses a number of lands they control equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice non-God creatures the same way.

[-3]: Discard a card. You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is that card's mana value.

cards.rules_text: Choose target creature you control and target creature you don't control. Flip a coin. If the coin comes up heads, put one of those creatures on top of its owner's library. Otherwise, put both of them on top of their owners' libraries.

Flying, prowess
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, reveal the bottom two cards of your library. Target opponent chooses one of them. Put that card on the bottom of your library and the rest into your hand.

Trial 4 (As you cast this spell, an opponent of your choice may pay 4 life. If they don't, they fail the trial.)
When Treacherous Devil enters, if an opponent passed the trial, that player gains control of Treacherous Devil.
Whenever Tremor Elemental enters or you draw a card except during your draw step, Tremor Elemental deals 1 damage to each creature.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]Created without a mouth, its calamity is its only way to express the fire in its soul.
[/i]

cards.rules_text: Erratic, erratic, erratic (When this creature dies, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put a creature card that costs less than this revealed this way onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. Repeat this process twice.)

Trample
Whenever Tusked Consumer or another creature with power 4 or greater you control enters, purge. (Exile two cards that share a type from graveyards. If you do, draw a card.)
Whenever one or more cards are put into exile from anywhere, you gain 1 life.

{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]Looking at the horizon, Marzen and Naberas shared the thought: will this land offer closure? Do I even deserve it?

cards.rules_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player mills two cards, then reveals the top card of their library and puts it on the bottom of their library.

Put a creature card that costs less than this revealed this way onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.)

cards.flavor_text:

[/i]

cards.rules_text: Reveal the top thirteen cards of your library. For each permanent type, you may put a card of that type revealed this way into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard. (The permanent types are creature, land, artifact, enchantment and planeswalker.)

Manifest the bottom card of your library. That creature gains lifelink and deathtouch until end of turn. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
cards.flavor_text:
